If life is a highway, you're flying down it at light speed in the opposite direction.
You're always jumping from one activity to the next, searching for something more exciting than the last.
Other people like to stop and smell the roses, but you prefer the rush of speeding onward.
Of course, this means you can sometimes rush into things without thinking, and it might occasionally get you into trouble.
But when it does, you land on your feet and take it like a champ.
A reckless person like you will be...
